1991.subject: WRT
1991.course_title_long: Reading and Writing the Japanese Mind
1991.descrlong: This course is offered to multilingual/ESL students simultaneously enrolled in JAPN306: The Japanese Mind.  Working with the subject matter of that course, WRT 206 focuses on developing English language academic reading and writing skills.  These include understanding the structure and conventions of written work in the humanities, the rhetorical differences among assigned texts in the field, and key elements of research in the field, while increasing fluency and mastery in English.
